decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers

Class EquipContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers.EquipContainer

  • public class EquipContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by P3TE on 7/10/2014. A VERY special type of container. It ONLY holds equipable items!

      • equipItem

        public boolean equipItem(EquipablePlayerItem item)
        By P3TE! Equips the desired item - and applies effects that are associated with that item.
        Parameters:
        item - - The item you want to equip.
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to equip the Item. false if the slots are currently full.

      • swapoutEquipedItem

      • unequipItem

        public EquipablePlayerItem unequipItem(EquipableSlots.EquipmentSlot slot)
        By P3TE! Un Equips the desired item - and removes effects that are associated with that item.
        Parameters:
        slot - - The EquipmentSlot that you want vacated.
        Returns:
        null - (if there was no Item in that slot. The Item that was in that slot.) EquipablePlayerItem - The item that was previously in that slot.

      • viewItemInSlot

        public EquipablePlayerItem viewItemInSlot(EquipableSlots.EquipmentSlot slot)
        By P3TE! Used to get the item within a slot.
        Parameters:
        slot - - The slot in which you want to get the item from.
        Returns:
        The item that is within that slot.
